ðŸ“– Summary: Kotlin DataFrame provides a typesafe and functional approach to structured data processing in Kotlin. It allows developers to work with hierarchical data, perform transformations using a readable DSL, and ensures type safety with Kotlin's null safety features. The library integrates well with Kotlin's ecosystem and supports various data formats.
